description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5qd58","text":"This protocol describes a method for the isolation of pan-lymphocytes, pan-myeloid cells, and progenitors from human spleen tissue. By providing defined media formulations, volumes at each step, and a defined dilution factor for density centrifugation, it yields consistent single-cell suspensions across samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5ql1","text":"Add   of DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution to the spleen tissue and use a scissors to chop the tissue into a fine âmashâ.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"16i8q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f6sor","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"FE0A3310E93211EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"EA6596CF344D11EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":230,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/fx9hbixhp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/fx9fbixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fx9gbixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/fx9ebixhp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"672up","text":"Add   of DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution to the mash of tissue, and distrubute and filter the tissue over   cell strainers above   tubes (about 4 filters/2 grams of tissue).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":97,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"du9hn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"coiu7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"359C4610E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"3970CDB0E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"3FA9F940E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"drnc5","text":"NOTE: Cell yields and ease of pushing through the filter are increased by using multiple filters/gram of tissue, default to using more filters to decrease processing time, and increase yields.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ca4u7","text":"Apply pressure with the black rubber bottom or the plastic end of a   syringe plunger to any remaining, partially digested tissue on the cell strainers, and intermittently wash through with DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution from a transfer pipet â the aim is to push and wash through the tissue until only pink/white connective tissue remains. When finished, combine the tubes of cell suspension and proceed to the next section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dmmqu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"4FCAD970E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47s43","text":"Centrifuge the cell suspensions for   at   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5ppo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9CC5BA60E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A0FBEA00E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A5C92980E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"do7cr","text":"Remove the supernatants and combine the cell pellets down to a single   tube, top to   with   DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cvqqa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"AD210B80E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"AFBFD240E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B26F13C0E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"512b9","text":"Filter the cell suspension through a   cell strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ef9ds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"B890E6C0E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8la38","text":"In two   tubes, layer   of cell suspension on top of   of Ficoll-Paque Media PLUS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"emobs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"BFAC8310E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"C251D980E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"C74B5920E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97lh8","text":"Spin for  ,   at   with 4 acceleration and 0 brake, evenly distribute the tubes across the entire rotor to prevent wobbling (use all four buckets if possible as opposed to just two).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"m0ql","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"D338A1C0E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"1200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D6249E20E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E0244790E93311EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab45i","text":"Remove the supernatants and re-suspend the cell pellets in   cold DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution and centrifuge the cell suspension for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":128,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":136,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cljk8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"17439B90E93411EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"1DA4C180E93411EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"120","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"23156CF0E93411EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"28311A90E93411EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffdit","text":"(Optional QC) Aliquot 2 x 106 cells to a 5mL Falcon tube and place on ice for subsequent flow cytometric analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":28,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tpca","text":"Aliquot cells for analysis or experimentation, and then freeze down cells in up to 3 x 107 aliquots using Cryostor CS10 Medium, a Mr. Frosty, and a   freezer ( -  aliquots, round down to the nearest 30 million cells and discard/freeze/use any left over cells). Record the number of vials frozen: __________.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":89,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":148,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":159,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":161,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f1u39","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A4516120E93411EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"AB5EA590E93411EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"AD8FB660E93411EB87EEB7F92BAB4C29","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
